Casper misc. versions (x86, x64), winblows.

--------------------

                             TEAM YAG presents:
                       Casper v4.0.1270 Tech Edition


Release-Date: 2008-03-19
Program Typ : hd cloning
URL         : http://www.fssdev.com


Release-Notes:
==============


QUICK AND EASY DISK CLONING FOR THE COMPUTER PROFESSIONAL
Designed especially for computer technicians, system integrators, and IT department use,
Casper Tech Edition makes it easy to perform hard disk upgrades, managed backups,
and sealed disk image deployment.

UPGRADING A HARD DISK HAS NEVER BEEN EASIER
With Casper Tech Edition upgrading hard disks on desktop PCs and laptops has never been
faster or easier. Casper Tech Edition clones all popular Windows configurations,
including all 32-bit and 64-bit versions of Windows Vista Ultimate,
Windows Vista Home Premium, Windows Vista Home Basic, Windows Vista Business,
Windows Vista Enterprise, Windows Vista Starter Edition, Windows XP Professional,
Windows XP Home Edition, Windows XP Tablet PC Edition, Windows XP Media Center Edition,
Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, Windows Server 2003, Windows 2000 Professional,
Windows ME, Windows 98SE, Windows 98, and Windows 95.

MAKES SHORT WORK OF HARD DISK BACKUPS
Exclusive SmartClone technology dramatically reduces the time required to perform managed
backups by safely eliminating the redundant transfer of data during the cloning process.

SIMPLIFIES MANAGED HARD DISK IMAGE DEPLOYMENT
The Casper Tech Edition CD greatly simplifies cloning hard disks for deployment to new
computer systems. When used in combination with Microsoft&#039;s Sysprep utility,
hard disk images can be sealed and deployed via direct disk-to-disk cloning.

EASY TO USE, DEPENDABLE, AND CONVENIENT
Casper Tech Edition runs directly from a network share, CD, or USB key.
The Casper Tech Edition CD makes it possible to boot a system and run Casper Tech Edition
directly from a CD-ROM drive or USB key with full access to external media devices
including USB and Firewire hard disks.
